description: man seated behind a table, gesturing with his PL hand and holding an upright book on table and pen with his PR hand; stack of books with open book at right; man has beard and wears wide-brimmed hat, ruffled collar and coat with fur trim
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pe right edge near center, in the plate: [Rembrandt]
title: Cornelis Claesz. Anslo, Preacher
